matador.board

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador.board.Field
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ownable, Refuge, Taxes

    public abstract class Field
extends Object
    Abstract class that all the fields used in Matador inherits from. Implements name and fieldNum which all fields in Matador have.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor taking a name and field number.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Field

        public Field(String name,
     int fieldNum)
        Constructor taking a name and field number.
        Parameters:
        name - String with the name of the field.
        fieldNum - int representing the field place in the provided GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • landOnField

        public abstract void landOnField(Player player)
        Performs the necessary actions on the Player landing on the field. Gets the players Konto and calls Konto.withdraw(int) or Konto.deposit(int) as necessary. If the player does not have sufficient money to pay the cost of landing on the field he will be set as a loser with a call to Player.setLoser()
        Parameters:
        player - Player landing on the field.
        See Also:
        Player, Konto

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name of a field.
        Returns:
        String name of field.

      • getFieldNum

        public int getFieldNum()
        Returns the field ID as used in the provided GUI.
        Returns:
        int field ID for GUI.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
